com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
Interface ProlStream

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProlMemoryPipe, ProlTextInputStream, ProlTextOutputStream
public interface ProlStream

The interface describes an abstract stream object which can be used by the prol engine

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)

Field Summary
static Term END_OF_FILE
          The constant describes the term which is used as the flag of the end of a file
